module.name: elegantaleasyimport
module.displayName: Easy Import Products From CSV, EXCEL, XML, JSON, TXT Files
module.description: Import/Export products and combinations easily with just a few clicks. You can automate this process by using CRON Job and import file from directory path, HTTP or FTP.
module.author: ELEGANTAL
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall?
